Price: $159.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:35:57 UTC – Details)

Product Description

【Seasons Apply】This car seat cover can be suitable for every season. The outside of the material is faux leather which can be used all year round. So there is no need to buy one in summer and buy another one in winter.
【Compatibility】 It is universal fit for most of cars, SUVs and trucks. Meanwhile it has a wonderful envelopment with the car seats which can maximize the protection to the seats. We leak out the air bags, so once an accident occurs, the air bags still work.
【Clean and Durability】 This car seat cover is quite easy to clean up when your kids or pets smudge it. It is waterproof so you can use the wet towel directly on it. And when it comes to the routine care, you can treat it the same way to your leather bag. The faux leather we used is not easy to be damaged or broken by your keys, pet’s paws or some other sharp metal. And it is also not easy to be burned up as we use a kind of material which contains fire retardant inside the seat cover.
【Installation】 The installation of this seat cover is not complex. You can install it by yourself through the installation video step by step and can also read the installation instruction inside the package. Don’t forget to communicate with us by emails if you are still frustrated with the installation and we will try our best to help you.
【Post-sale service】 It has 30 days return-protection guarantee and the delivery is through the FBA. We have a problem solving team stand by and if you have any questions you can find us by emails quickly and we will try our best to help you. So just have a try and we are sure you will be satisfied with our products.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $15.99 - $9.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:00:13 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Hello, Ladies and Gentlemen!

Whether you’re taking a road trip or commuting to work, if you have a family or spend a lot of time traveling from place to place in your car, having a car trash can is an easy way to keep your vehicle’s interior tidy. We’re all guilty of tossing crumpled-up napkins, crumbs, change into our cup holders. Avoid the buildup of trash with a Vankor car trash can! In order to meet the aesthetics of a wider range of car interior decoration styles and people, we have designed solid and floral pattern. Before launching these car trash bags, we thoroughly checked it for capacity, ease of installation, and additional features, including dual functionality as a car organizer. These auto trash bag will keep you organized and make it easier to throw out your garbage. Okay, Just start your travel now!

Car Trash Can with Lid

Soft lid to put the bottle and other car trash easily. Don’t worry about soiled by unfinished drinks.

Waterproof & Seamless Linning

100% leak-proof lining to ensure your car is dry & neat.

Adjustable Buckle & Strudy Stitching

Car trash bag hanging is designed for most car, trucks, minivans, campers; You can install easily it in somewhere of your car. Strudy Stitching to ensure it has a long service life.

As a Car Trash Can

It is easy to collect wrappers, receipts, and odds and ends in your car. For it to not look dirty and cluttered, keep a car trash can in your car.

As a Car Cooler

These car trash cans are even insulated, which means you can use them as a cooler when traveling to visit family.

As a Storage Bag

Having a garbage can in the car is the best way to storage snacks and food for the car.

Universal Compatibility

Make everywhere clean: the multifunction trash can not only make your car clean and tidy but also hold up lots of garbage or food at some situations like Family Gathering, Journey, Picnic, Camping, Short Trip, Beach and so on.

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 1, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Vankor
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09X36F1ZK

【KEEP YOUR CAR CLEAN】- Are you always bothered by the messy of the car interior? Vankor’s car trash can with lid will help you to solve this annoyance. This cute car trash can will be helpful for keeping your car clutter-free, ensuring you are in a good mood while driving. Large car trash can with an adjustable strap is hung on the gear shift, glove box, headrest. You can also display the hanging car trash bag on the floor, hanging on the back seat, co-driver seat, or any place in your car.
【MULTIPURPOSE STORAGE】- Vankor car garbage can is functional, you can put the car garbage into the main bag, there are 3 outer pouch pockets of garbage can for car that will be great to help storage. You can put tissue packs, wipes, snacks, umbrellas, and other little things that you need to keep in your car to avoid mess, and for easy access. In addition, the waterproof performance also achieves the automotive garbage cans an excellent storage bag when you are camping or picnicking.
【INTIMATE DESIGN & CAPACITY 】- There are 2 side clasps for fixing disposable bags, effectively preventing falling out. Car trash bags have about 2 .5 Gallons for storage of car garbage or other stuff. Car trash bin has 100% leak-proof PEVA thick lining, no spillages will happen and is easy to be cleaned. The extra-large opening is made of elastic soft rubber, very roomy and easier to put litter into the bag, and helps to keep trash from spilling.
【WIDE COMPATIBILITY 】– An thoughtful solution for people who have the need for car neat and car interior storage. Perfectly fits varieties of types of vehicles including sedans, SUVs, RVs, trucks, vans, minivans, boats, campers, taxis, buses, etc. Auto trash can for car is very sturdy and durable, has a long service life, and is very convenient to carry. The car trash can for the back seat is foldable, When you don’t need it, just fold it up without taking up any space.
【STRICT QUALITY CONTROL】- Our company specializes in the portable car trash can for car, and every product is strictly inspected before it goes to the Amazon warehouse. Waterproof car trash can’s pictures are shot with an HD camera to ensure the authenticity of the product colors and details. Vankor aims to provide customers with a better product experience of car trash can bags and offer effective solutions for you.


Hello, Ladies and Gentlemen!

Whether you’re taking a road trip or commuting to work, if you have a family or spend a lot of time traveling from place to place in your car, having a car trash can is an easy way to keep your vehicle’s interior tidy. We’re all guilty of tossing crumpled-up napkins, crumbs, change into our cup holders. Avoid the buildup of trash with a Vankor car trash can! In order to meet the aesthetics of a wider range of car interior decoration styles and people, we have designed solid and floral pattern. Before launching these car trash bags, we thoroughly checked it for capacity, ease of installation, and additional features, including dual functionality as a car organizer. These auto trash bag will keep you organized and make it easier to throw out your garbage. Okay, Just start your travel now!




Car Trash Can with Lid

Soft lid to put the bottle and other car trash easily. Don’t worry about soiled by unfinished drinks.

Waterproof & Seamless Linning

100% leak-proof lining to ensure your car is dry & neat.

Adjustable Buckle & Strudy Stitching

Car trash bag hanging is designed for most car, trucks, minivans, campers; You can install easily it in somewhere of your car. Strudy Stitching to ensure it has a long service life.

Read more




As a Car Trash Can

It is easy to collect wrappers, receipts, and odds and ends in your car. For it to not look dirty and cluttered, keep a car trash can in your car.

As a Car Cooler

These car trash cans are even insulated, which means you can use them as a cooler when traveling to visit family.

As a Storage Bag

Having a garbage can in the car is the best way to storage snacks and food for the car.

Read more


Universal Compatibility

Make everywhere clean: the multifunction trash can not only make your car clean and tidy but also hold up lots of garbage or food at some situations like Family Gathering, Journey, Picnic, Camping, Short Trip, Beach and so on.

item.title: Car Install Tools for Vinyl Wrap, Vehicle Tint Window Film Kit Includes Vinyl Wrap Magnets, Edge Trimming Tools, Felt Squeegee, Wrapping Cutter, 9mm Knife
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 7 in1 Edge Trimming Squeegee: The squeegee set has 14 ends with different shapes, which fit for any edge of your car, such as headlight, Bumper, car doors handle, Car center-console. CARTINTS brand edge trimming squeegee will help you complete vinyl film wrapping in narrow corners.4 Inches Felt Edge Squeegee: ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:37:59 UTC – Details)



7 in1 Edge Trimming Squeegee: The squeegee set has 14 ends with different shapes, which fit for any edge of your car, such as headlight, Bumper, car doors handle, Car center-console. CARTINTS brand edge trimming squeegee will help you complete vinyl film wrapping in narrow corners.
4 Inches Felt Edge Squeegee: Made of soft plastic, strong enough to improve the efficiency of smoothing vinyl film. Microfiber felt edge squeegee will not leave any scratches or marks on the thin self-adhesive paper.
Vinyl Wrap Cutter And 9mm Knife Blade: The razor cutter is safe enough for you to cut off vinyl film roll because its blade is hidden inside. The retractable 9 mm knife is the best to trim the excess vinyl film or cut the size you want. Snap off blade will miantain long time best cutting performance.
Vinyl Wrap Magnets and Work Gloves: You can use the vinyl magnet tool to hold the large vinyl film paper so that you can free your hands to finish the details from smoothing to trimming.Work gloves is the key tool to prevent hands injury, or the damages of vinyl wrap paper.
Package: 7 x blue hard edge-trimming squeegee, 2x blue felt squeegee, 2 x vinyl wrap magnet holder,1 x 9mm utility knife,10 x blades,5 x squeegee felts replacement,1 x safe red cutter, 1x black work gloves

4.5
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:37:59 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $23.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Turn the backseat into a closet on wheels

Traveling in the car with dresses and clothes?Yes,This Car Clothes Hanger Bar from Mysbiker makes it easy to keep your clothes tidy and clean. when you’re on the go. Whether you’re traveling for work or just taking a road trip.Your clothes will stay fresh and wrinkled- free as they hanging in your vehicle .This bar can be attached to the overhead handles or garment hooks on your back seat, It’s more stable and it accommodates a far greater load than traditional bars.You may need this during a road trip, family vacations, or before an important meeting.

Easy To Install And Expand Without Much Effort

Two Ways to Install: Fix the end hook in the lower position to hook the handle, or rotate vertically to hang on the ceiling hook.Universal Fit: The bysbiker expandable clothes bar can extend from 35 in to 59 in. This allows more space for hanging and to perfectly fit most vehicles.Perfect for college students, movings,and cross-country road tours.Rubberized grip sleeves and dividers keep clothes from sliding during driving.Easy to Install: The bar has dual mount hangers that can quickly attach to interior grab handles and garment hooks,no tools required.

Heavy-duty Metal Car Clothes Bar

Heavy-duty, metal car clothes bar holds up to 30 lbs.Perfect for college students, moving, vacationers and cross-country road tours, it expands from 35″ to 59″ to fit most cars, and features adjustable grip sleeves and dividers to keep clothes from sliding, even on the tightest turns.

Extendable

Universal Fit with Extendable Bars: Our extendable clothes bar can extend from 35 inches to 59 inches and maximally holds up to 30 lbs of clothing to accommodate sedans, vans, SUVs,Trucks and more.

Non-Slip Rubber Grips

The expandable Car Clothes Bar is covered with anti-slip rubber to keep the clothes from sliding around during driving.

Material
PVC+TPU ABS+Rubber Alloy steel Alloy Steel+Rubber

Color
Black Black Silver/Black Black

Size
8.3 x 6.1 x 3.6″ 6.7 x 2.4 x 3.9″ 10.6 x 4.5 x 1.9″ 36 x 2.6 x 2.5″

Application
Phone below 6.5″ like Iphone12、11,Pro Max X XR Xs 7s 8 Plus 7 6s 6, Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 A71 A51 A10,Note20 10 /9/8/4,Xiaomi, Huawei, oppo LG, Sony, Moto, Google Pixel, Nexus etc. 4″-6.5″devices： Such as Iphone12、11,Pro Max X XR Xs 7s 8 Plus 7 6s 6, Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 A71 A51 A10,Note20 10 /9/8/4,Xiaomi, Huawei, oppo LG, Sony, Moto, Google Pixel, Nexus etc. Motorcycles, bicycles, scooters and any vehicle where there are holes or spokes on a wheel. Sedans,Vans,SUVs,Trucks and Jeep.Such as Ford (Focus ST Explorer)、 Honda CRV、 Toyota （Corolla E350 ）、Chrysler （Mini Van 2019 f250）、 Equinox 、Canyon 、Nissan （Pathfinder）、Rogue、 Murano、 Traverse 、Acadia（2014 GMC ）and etc.

Key Feature
Universal fit,Waterproof,Sensitive Tough Screen,Large Capacity Shockproof,360°Rotation,Wide Compatibility,One-hand Operation,Waterproof Easy to Lock, 110dB Alarm Deterrent, Waterproof, Anti-theft Expand up to 65 inches,Durable and Load-bearing,Easy to Install

►A Moving Wardrobe: The Mysbiker car clothes hanger bar would keep your clothes wrinkle-free during road trips,family vacations,laundry or business trips where your clothes need to be kept or hung neatly without collapsing in your vehicles.This clothes bar is Really helped in packing for a cross country trip,car camping.Just a magic wand will turn your car into a mobile wardrobe.
►Universal Fit: The vehicle clothes hanging rack that fits most every vehicle on the road.Expandable from 33 inch to 63.5 inch easy to adjust the length,max holds up to 50 lbs of clothing to accommodate sedans,vans,SUVs,Trucks and more.
► Rubber Grips and Rings: The clothes rod bar adopts 3 sections of Non-Slip Grips Dividers and rubberized grip sleeves enable you to organize and not worry about things flying all over the place , even on tight turns for a smoother.so you can hang a suit, dress shirts, button ups, pants, etc
►Durable and Load-bearing: The Car Hanger are constructed of rust-resistant, powder coated steel,which is durable and load-bearing. Up to 50 pounds (approximately 22.7 kg), which means you can hang 80-100 T-shirts or 40-50 suits at the same time even when fully extended.
►Easy to Install: There are two ways to connect the hanging bar : fix the end hook in the lower position to hook the handle, or rotate vertically to hang on the ceiling hook. just pivoting end hangers can be turned down to hook over car grab handles, or rotated upright to hang securely from garment hooks.

Turn the backseat into a closet on wheels

Whether you’re traveling for work or just taking a road trip.Your clothes will stay fresh and wrinkled- free as they hanging in your vehicle .

Product Description

APOLOGY:

THE COLOUR WE CALL “BLACK AND WHITE” IS ACTUALLY NOT THE CORRECT COLOUR WHICH WE MADE A MISTAKE WHILE BUILDING THE LISTS. AND AS THE COLOUR BLANK COULD NEVER BE ALTERED SINCE BEEN SUBMITED. SO WE MAKE THE APOLOGY HERE AND THE “WHITE” IN “BLACK AND WHITE” IS ACTUALLY “CREAM”.WE ARE REALLY SORRY FOR THE MISTAKE WE HAVE MADE AND PROMISE WE WOULD BE MORE CAUTIOUS IN THE JOB COMING UP.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION:

Effective Protection: Use High-quality leatherette as the surface of Cushions, waterproof, wear-resistant and easy to clean, can be cleaned by wet towel. Fashion Looking: Upgrade your vehicle instantly with this fashion looking and Quickly customize and refresh the look of your interior.Easy to Install: We provide product installation videos. Just follow the installation instructions, it usually takes 10-20 minutes to complete the installation.

THE PACKAGE INCLUDING:FRONT ROW COVER*2PCS, REAR ROW COVER*2PCS, INSTALLATION INSTRUCTION*1PC, INSTALLATION FITTINGS*1 PACK

J010 BLACK

DETAILS

THE BACK COVER OF THE FRONT SEAT IS FULLY WRAPPED AND PERFECTLY PROTECTED.

WE USE SOME SPECIAL MATERIALS IN THE SIDE COVER TO MAKE SURE THERE WOULD NO EFFECTS ON THE WORK OF THE AIRBAGS.

WE HAVE BUCKLES EXPOSED IN THE REAR SEAT AND THE EDGE OF THE BACK SEAT IS WELL WRAPPED AS WELL.

THE FAUX LEATHER IN THIS ITEM IS DURABLE AND EASY TO BE MAINTAINED IN DAILY LIFE.THERE IS A BACK POCKET IN EACH FRONT SEAT COVER WHICH IS SO CONVENIENT IN OUR CAR LIFE.

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $79.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:50 UTC – Details)


Tackle your next adventure with the Rightline Gear Range Jr car top and roof rack cargo carrier. Designed for use WITH or WITHOUT a roof rack, you can attach the straps of this roof cargo bag to your vehicle’s roof rack or use the included car clips to attach the straps to a vehicle’s door frame weather molding – the only revolutionary solution of its kind that WILL NOT interfere with passenger headroom. Rated Weatherproof +, the Range Jr’s UV-protected PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT shell, urethane-coated zipper, and hook-and-loop-close zipper flap provide a dual barrier from the elements. Featuring 10 cubic feet of rooftop storage, this compact car luggage carrier roof bag allows you to transport your cargo and your passengers without compromising on safety, comfort, or convenience. All Rightline Gear products come backed by a 1-year manufacturer’s warranty, so Gear up with confidence!
Car Top Carrier: Our convenient roof cargo carrier allows you to keep your gear up top, so you can transport belongings and passengers without compromising on safety, comfort, or convenience
Intuitive Features: Specially designed to keep your gear dry, our waterproof car roof cargo carrier features welded seams, an urethane-coated zipper, and a hook-and-loop-close zipper flap
Quality Construction: Constructed of UV-protected PVC semi-coated mesh, our durable vehicle cargo carriers are designed to keep your belongings dry and won’t fly off your roof
Simple Setup: Simply attach the straps of the roof bag to your vehicle’s roof rack or use the included car clips to attach the straps to your vehicle’s door frame weather molding
Seamless Storage: Our rooftop cargo bag folds down for storage in the included stuff sack; Car roof bag, 4 attachment straps, 4 car clips, and stuff sack with sewn-in setup guide included

What makes Rightline Gear Range Car Top Carriers Weatherproof +?

A step up from Rightline Gear’s Ace Car Top Carriers, The Range Carriers add a urethane coated zipper. A zipper flap adds extra protection. All seams of the carrier are welded watertight and Rightline Gear’s proprietary PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT stands up to the elements for years to come. Other carriers may claim to be waterproof or weatherproof, but they do not have the features to back it up.

Read more

Features

Urethane Coated Zipper

The Range Car Top Carriers use Urethane Coated Zippers as the first line of defense against moisture and the elements, while other carriers use standard zippers with exposed teeth that let water in!

PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT

High velocities are no match for Range Car Top Carriers, thanks to their heavy-duty, Xtra Tough PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT construction.

Stuff Sack

All of Rightline Gear’s Range Car Top Carriers come with a handy stuff sack so your carrier is always on hand when you need it, and easily stows away when you don’t.

Read more

Attachment Methods

WITH a Roof Rack

Loop the included straps around the roof rack side rails or cross bars.

WITHOUT a Roof Rack – Car Clips

Start with the Car Clips on the (4) attachment straps. Open the vehicle’s doors and hook the Car Clips under the door frame weather molding.

Read more

Standard Airline Carry-on.

Carrier Fit Guide

To ensure a proper fit, please measure your vehicle’s roof (as shown above) and compare to the carrier’s dimensions.

  • Range Jr: 36” L x 32” W x 15” H
  • Compact Cars to SUVs, minivans
  • Popular Examples: Honda Civic, Toyota Corolla, Ford Focus, Chevy Cruze
  • Will fit larger vehicles as well

Carrier Capacity Guide

The guide below will give you a general idea of how many suitcases each Rightline Gear Car Top Carrier will hold. The guide references a standard Airline Carry-on Bag (14″ W x 8″ D x 22″ H, 1.43 cu ft).

  • Range 3: 18 cu ft = ~12 Carry-on Bags
  • Sport 3: 18 cu ft = ~12 Carry-on Bags
  • Range 2: 15 cu ft = ~10 Carry-on Bags
  • Sport 2: 15 cu ft = ~10 Carry-on Bags
  • Ace 2: 15 cu ft = ~10 Carry-on Bags
  • Range Jr: 10 cu ft = ~7 Carry-on Bags
  • Sport Jr: 10 cu ft = ~7 Carry-on Bags
  • Ace Jr: 9 cu ft = ~6 Carry-on Bags

Read more

Auto Parts

Auto Parts

Accessories For Harley

Alpha Rider began designing and manufacturing Motorcycle Parts with an innovative flair in 2010.

We‘ve since grown to become one of the largest providers of Motorcycle accessories .

We ask ourselves: What would you like to do with your Motorcycle… that enhances your life?

Our approach has given birth to some of the best known accessories .

Auto Parts

Auto Parts

【Wide Application】Perfectly fit all types of vehicles. This ground strap is a good parner that connects an engine block to a framework. The rated current of this engine ground strap is 62 Amps.
【High-quality Copper Materials】 This ground strap is made of copper with a tin-plated surface to provide superior current delivery, resistance to oxidation and corrosion, as well as a long service life.
【Practical Structure】 These braided ground straps is 1/2″ wide, which provide durability, flexibility and maximum conductivity.The 5/16″ Rings Terminal makes installation a breeze.
【Package Included】3pcs 10″x 1/2″ & 2pcs 13″ x 1/2″ Professional Vehicle Grounding Cable Straps are included.Each strap is built from center to center of lugs holes.
【Great Service Support】 If you encounter any problems in the process of purchasing and using this product, please feel free to contact us. We will solve the problem for you in the first time and provide you with the best after-sales service.

【Car Heater 12V Portable Defroster and Defogger 】You can use this heater to defrosting or demisting a vehicle’s windshield and window, keeping your view in driving is clearly. But if the temperature is very low, the 150W heater needs enough time to reach a relatively high temperature before defrosting and demisting.
【2 IN 1 Cooling and Heating Function】 Change the switch and the hot air or cool fan come out immediately. Heating quickly, bid farewell to the long wait. It can also be used as a car fan to cool your car in the summer. Let you enjoy the cool summer and the warmth of the winter.
【Portable Car Heater】The Car Heater with 360-degree rotating support, you can fix the heater in your favorite position and adjust to your preferred angle. Compact size, portable and convenient to use, low noise. The large outlet provides a large are a of the air, which is rapid heating or cooling, very efficient.
【Premium material Fully Protection】Made with ABS material, this heater is not something that breaks easy. built-in fuse and safe automatic power failure protection. It boasts the concentrated air outlet, long and wide range.The small size allows it to be installed in the car without blocking the line of sight.
【Quick and Easy Install】: Simply take it out of the box and plug into your cigarette lighter socket and press the fan or heater switch and the fan starts working(Make sure your car has a 12V vehicle’s cigarette socket).
